name: 日本の住宅の玄関 Modern Genkan in Japanese Houses
description:
日本のモダンなおうちの玄関 Modern Genkan in Japanese Houses

　

集合住宅の玄関（家の中から）Entrance of an apartment building (from inside the house)

genkan, JMG2, door, wooden floor, shoes removed, shoes, indoors, scenery,

genkan, JMG2, door, scenery, indoors, tiles, tile floor, open door, slippers, towel, box, wooden floor,

　

集合住宅の玄関（家の外から）Entrance to an apartment building (from outside the house)

JMG3, genkan, door, indoors, scenery, hallway,

　

一軒家の玄関（家の中から）Entrance of a house (from inside)

genkan, JMG1, door, hallway, scenery, indoors, tiles, tile floor, open door, window, light, ceiling light,

　

一軒家の玄関（家の外から）Entrance of a house (from outside)

genkan, JMG0, door, scenery, window, tiles, tile floor, outdoors, day, open door, exterior

genkan, JMG0, scenery, door, tree, plant, window, outdoors, building, exterior

genkan, JMG0, scenery, outdoors, sky, tree, cloud, day, plant, building, door, blue sky, window, shadow, wall, house, stairs, exterior

　

realisticを足すと描画がリアル風味になります　Adding "realistic" makes the drawing more realistic.

※どうやら玄関で靴を脱ぐ概念の学習は難しかったようです。

*Learning the concept of taking off shoes at the entrance was difficult.
